MacIntuneManifest.Name: CIS Level 2 - Disable Bonjour Advertisements
MacIntuneManifest.Description: Disables multicast DNS advertisements (Bonjour) to reduce network exposure. This CIS Level 2 security baseline control sets NoMulticastAdvertisements to true, preventing the system from advertising services via mDNS/Bonjour on the local network. Reduces attack surface by hiding services from network discovery and preventing information disclosure about running services, shares, and applications.
